events.message: We have received the candidate's application for our software engineer position and it looks promising based on the resume submitted.
The application has been categorized successfully under Engineering since the candidate's experience aligns well with software development requirements.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process to ensure proper follow-up.
The initial phone screening with the candidate went well; technical knowledge and communication skills meet our current expectations.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening results and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the interview process.
We have scheduled a technical interview with senior developers for next Tuesday to further assess the candidateâ€™s software engineering skills.
